overview:
Oliver Bevan joined Dunedin in 2007. He is responsible for sourcing and transacting deals across the UK and focuses on Oil and Gas and Financial Services. Oliver worked on the buyouts of CitySprint and Hawksford International and sits on the board of Practice Plan.

He graduated from Oxford with a BA honours in Modern History. After graduating he joined Booz Allen & Hamilton as a strategy consultant, working on projects in the UK and Europe. He went on to work at the financial services practice of EDS Business Consulting before joining the group strategy and M&A team of Lloyds TSB. Oliver has also completed the Chartered Financial Analyst (CFA) program.
